thread.section_title: Support Petitions on Political Issues that Matter to You
thread.title: WE STAND WITH COACH FLOYD!

title: WE STAND WITH COACH FLOYD!
text:
target: MVISD School Board, Mount Vernon, TX 
The purpose of this petition is to respectfully ask the MVISD School Board to show their support for Coach Brad Floyd by voting NO to the recommendation of placing him on suspension without pay (or any form of suspension at all). read petition letter â–¾ 
This petition is being circulated to show the MVISD School Board and Superintendent just how many people support Coach Floyd. Coach Floyd is a valuable asset to our school district and community. We will no longer sit idly by and watch as innocent, hard-working employees are subjected to such treatment as Coach Floyd (and others before him) is enduring. We also feel it to be a cowardly move on the part of the Board to not allow a Public Comments section to the Special Meeting called for Thursday, January 5, at 5:45 PM. We respectfully ask the Board to not suspend Coach Floyd and to show their support for him by voting NO . Please sign and share this petition, and also be present at the meeting Thursday night. We stand with Coach Floyd!
